Name: Afsar Jahan
Title: Habibullah Estate
Review: The place is an amazing dining and shopping venue. What more if you like clicking pictures amidst the greenery .yes,exactly. I have been visiting this place regularly since last month and I recommend you all to visit this place

Name: SHIVI AWASTHI
Title: habibullah estate visit
Review: I visit this  place almost daily.The place has cherry tree cafe which provides with best meals and drinks to quench my hunger.The place has designer stores of reputed designers and the collection they hold is really splendid.Satyapaul has amazing  tie and bag collection which I keep bying prominently.ever want to know the secret of my beautiful pictures ,come to the estate and get yourself clicked in the greenery that envelops the estate.When in lucknow,visit this place .

Name: niya27
Title: Not an attraction
Review: Habibullal Estate is not a tourist place. It is a complex with few shops such as Anokhi, parlour etc. It should be skipped.

Name: kushBans
Title: Okayish place
Review: You can find some decent stores here. We went to geetanjali saloon and the experience was up to the mark for us.

Name: akankshacoolgirl
Title: Shopping !!
Review: Habibullah estate is a nice place for shopping at his a great stores and saloon. This place is a god shopping option in the city.

Name: 268yusufn
Title: GOOD LANE
Review: This lane has few store but good ones. its has designer store and even superb saloon geetanjali . Even cherry tree on the same lane.
